featured.text: The ancient Greeks and Romans were also fascinated by the idea of magic.
A lot of ancient civilizations, __(37)__ the Egyptians, Hindus, Greeks, and Mayans, have left writings and __(38)__ which indicate contacts with superior beings “from the stars.”

definition.zh_def: 希臘人；希臘語的使用者或與希臘文化相關的人。
definition.en_def: People from Greece or those who speak Greek and are associated with Greek culture.
definition.example: The Greeks have a rich history that dates back thousands of years.
